gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 123, Pistons 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Pistons, 123-91. Franz Wagner (27 points, three assists) and Paolo Banchero (24 points, four rebounds, two assists) led the Magic as Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 21 points and six assists. The Magic snap a 2-game losing streak and improve to 15-7 overall as the Pistons move to 2-20.
